description: Try our easy to follow Ultimate Roast Tomato Ragu With Pappardelle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ragu,Eggplant,Low saturated fat,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Mushroom,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Mince,Tomato,Low fat,Peanut free,Slow cooked
name: Ultimate Roast Tomato Ragu With Pappardelle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Combine oil and garlic in a large roasting pan. Place into oven to heat for 5 minutes. Add vegetables, mince and herbs and toss well to coat with hot oil. Bake for 30 minutes until golden, stirring well half-way through cooking time to break up the mince.
Add tomato paste and beef stock, stirring to combine. Place tomatoes on top and bake for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile cook pasta as per packet instructions. Transfer tomatoes to a plate. Drain pasta and toss with sauce. Serve topped with tomatoes, parmesan and parsley.
